# Pull Request Template

## ðŸš€ High-Velocity Contribution Checklist

Before submitting your Pull Request, please ensure you have:

- [ ] **Scoped Change:** Your changes are focused on a single feature or bug fix.
- [ ] **Clarity:** The PR title and description are concise and informative.
- [ ] **Testing:** All relevant unit, integration, or E2E tests have been written or updated and pass.
- [ ] **Linting & Formatting:** Code adheres to project standards (Biome/Ruff).
- [ ] **Documentation:** Any new or modified public APIs are documented.
- [ ] **AI Agent Alignment:** Changes do not negatively impact AI agent directives or tooling.
- [ ] **Dependency Management:** `package.json` or equivalent has been updated if dependencies changed.

## ðŸ’¡ Description

**Please provide a clear and concise summary of your changes.**

*   **What problem does this PR solve?**
*   **What was the approach taken?**
*   **Are there any breaking changes?**
*   **How can this be tested?**
